title: Swarna Pallaki Jhumkas: Exquisite Gold Chandbali Earrings
materials: Hyderabadi Polish for a radiant shine.
features: Intricate filigree design resembling a traditional 'Pallaki' (palanquin). The chandbali shape is enhanced with cascading gold bead drops. Delicate floral motifs are set with glittering natural white diamonds. The design incorporates traditional South Indian auspicious color combinations with Ruby and Emerald accents.
colors: Dominantly Gold with accents of Red (Ruby)
occasions: and traditional ceremonies such as seemantham ( సీమంతం )
half-saree function ( పడుగ ). Also suitable for upscale evening events or adding a touch of heritage to modern outfits.
description: Handcrafted by skilled artisans using traditional Telugu jewelry techniques. These earrings are a statement of heritage and timeless beauty. The design is inspired by the rich cultural heritage of South India, offering a unique blend of tradition and elegance. The high-quality gold and gemstones ensure lasting value and brilliance.
